name: Jam Sessions 2
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

THE ONLY GAME THAT CAN MAKE YOU A BETTER GUITAR PLAYER

  • PLAY LIKE A PRO
    • -Play hits written by REM, Heart, Plain White T's, the Ramones, and many more - each new song you learn improves your guitar and songwriting skills in real life!
  • EXPRESS YOUR CREATIVITY - A robust editing suite allows you to compose and record your own unique songs, then share them wirelessly with friends.
(screenshot caption)
  • Fun and easy gameplay!
